name: Beet and Carrot Koshimbir(spiced salad). vegan glutenfree.
description: This Beet and Carrot Salad is tempered with Indian spices. It is called Koshimbir and works well with an Indian spread.
recipeIngredient: 1  medium Beet grated (raw or roasted/boiled beet)
5-6  baby carrots grated or chopped small
a generous pinch of raw sugar
a generous pinch of black pepper ( or red chili powder)
a generous pinch of asofoetida (hing (or use garlic powder if you dont have hing. Add garlic powder once you take the oil off heat))
1  green chili slit ( or to taste)
Crushed roasted peanuts or shredded coconut.

recipeInstructions.text: Grate beet and carrots. Add salt, sugar, lemon juice and pepper. Mix well and keep in a bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Add mustard seeds when the oil is hot.

recipeInstructions.text: Let the mustard seeds start to pop, then add asofoetida and chili.
